definition: stream of water (as from a fountain or a faucet)/jet of water
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Jets of water kept coming out of the broken pipe. Even the street had to be closed.
sentences.chinese: 管線破掉，不斷地噴出水柱，連街道都必須封鎖了。

sentences.english: The water column height of water-jet and time delay problem are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了射流水柱高度及射流時延問題。

sentences.english: When an erosive material catches fire, it should be put out with water cannon.
sentences.chinese: 腐蝕品着火時，可用水柱直接噴射撲救。

sentences.english: The gaseous weapon residues are then vented through the hollow central portion of the water column.
sentences.chinese: 這時氣態的炸彈剩餘物將通過水柱中央噴到大氣中。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the water column retractable -chuen, mouth, all reverted to calm.
sentences.chinese: 轉瞬間，水柱縮回泉口，一切復歸平靜。

sentences.english: Hiyakey 516: It fires high-pressure water from its tail with the force to destroy a concrete wall.
sentences.chinese: 它用尾巴發射高壓水柱，力量足以破壞一堵牆。

sentences.english: A tangled kelp forest fills the water column off the coast of Maine.
sentences.chinese: 纏結的海帶森林瀰漫着水柱沿海海面的緬因州。

sentences.english: The whole of the plume fell back into the surface of the water where the low-lying base surge cloud was formed.
sentences.chinese: 整個水柱回降到水面上，並形成緊貼海面的基浪雲霧。

sentences.english: A riot police vehicle releases a jet of water against demonstrators during a student rally in Santiago, on August 9, 2011. (Reuters/Victor Ruiz Caballero)
sentences.chinese: 聖地亞哥學生集會上，防暴車向示威者噴射水柱。

definition: water screen (screen formed of sprayed water droplets, used for displaying projected images, for temperature control, or for air purification)
spout/spray/belch/to well up/to puff out/to spurt out
